Category: Facial Cleanser

chunk: Ingredients: Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Meal, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis (Marigold) Flower Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Populus Tremuloides (Aspen) Bark Extract,
book: 2659-Honest Beauty Refreshingly Clean Powder Cleanser (2018 formulation)

chunk: Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis (Marigold) Flower Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Populus Tremuloides (Aspen) Bark Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Potassium Sorbate
book: 2659-Honest Beauty Refreshingly Clean Powder Cleanser (2018 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Tear packet and pour cleansing powder into palm. Wet opposite palm and rub hands together to create a light, gentle foam. Massage onto face. Rinse and pat dry. Avoid contact with eyes.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer
book: 2659-Honest Beauty Refreshingly Clean Powder Cleanser (2018 formulation)
